page.title: 14BMX BIKES
page.content:
{ BMX { } In the 1980's the biggest craze in this area started. It came from America,and it was called a BMX,Bicycle motor cross. There are BMX centres all round Britain,some of the famous people are Andy Ruffel,Tim March,Andy Preston,Craig Cambell,Mike Pardon. The most expensive model is Hutch Prostar at Â£1220.Here are a few makes, Raleigh Burner,Mag Burner,GLS,PK Ripper & Redline.Unlike some of the crazes such as skateboard,Rubic Cubes &STAR WARS.Now most skateboard parks have been turned into BMX freestyle tracks.
BY BEN R AND PETER G
